welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mulifanua, Samoa! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality, beautiful beaches, and rich cultural heritage of our charming city. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mulifanua has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Faleolo Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Faleolo Airport serves all domestic flights within Samoa.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Faleolo Airport serves all international flights to and from Samoa.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fagali I Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maota Savaii Island Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
